originalText.text: My fur baby was actually happy after her experience here! I was actually really happy and satisfied with how well they took care of her . She is a big German mix that is really scared of vets and bathing. She seemed very comfortable with the workers there so I was myself comfortable leaving her . Thank you üòä

originalText.text:
I‚Äôm just done with this place. I went to Petness world twice when I first moved here and was disappointed both times. Then I found someone who groomed from home and she was great and my dog always looked great, but she stopped her business. So out of desperation I went back to this place because they are nearby and open on Sundays. The place is cramped and chaotic with too many dogs and people. They always up charge me for ‚Äúbeing difficult and aggressive‚Äù which is frustrating because in the 12 years I‚Äôve had my dog this is the ONLY place that says he‚Äôs aggressive. I don‚Äôt think they are lying. I think the place is not managed well enough and the dogs are handled in a way that causes anxiety which leads to my dogs bad behavior. But the main reason I‚Äôm finally leaving the review they deserve is this time he had so much razor burn that I am beyond livid. I‚Äôd rather spend twice as much for quality care and go halfway across town then ever go back to this dump.

EDIT: I just picked up my dog from Paws Country Club and am blown away. There was no issue with biting, the place is clean and quiet and so well run and worth the extra commute and cost. It‚Äôs confirmed that everything wrong with my experience with Petness World is because of how they are run and not my dog.

originalText.text: Great communication with the people here. Texting me updates and photos. I was able to get a last minute booking and I asked them if I wasn't able to pick up our buddy right away could they take care of him. Just then I thought to ask if they knew of a pet taxi service to have them dropped off. Which they did! So grateful and happy with the service they provided!

I was able to get a last minute booking and I asked them if I wasn't able to pick up our buddy right away could they take care of him. Just then I thought to ask if they knew of a pet taxi service to have them dropped off. Which they did! So grateful and happy with the service they provided!

originalText.text: I am writing to express my concern about the conditions at your dog facility. During my visit, I observed dogs on the floor, on tables, and some chained up, with no kennels or separation for dogs of different sizes. This environment appears unsanitary and potentially unsafe for both humans and dogs. As a dog parent, I would advise others to exercise caution and consider alternative facilities that prioritize the well-being and safety of canine guests."

originalText.text: These guys are the 1st place that grooms rabbits and trims nails . Very inexpensive. Good work. The vets complimented on there service too.
